PAD_NeverThoughtWouldReturn.synopsis: Jaheira comments about returning to a mindflayer colony, which Laez'al, Wyll and Astarion comment on. It's mentioned that this is Jaheira reflecting on coming to one of these with Abdel Adrian,
PAD_NeverThoughtWouldReturn.how_to_trigger: - Enter the colony past the first membrane with the mentioned party

PAD.synopsis: PAD discussing the Colony, how eerie it is, and reflecting on the (similar) nautiloid at the beginning of the game.Started through COL_Entrance_VBFor Wyll: discussing either his mission to save his father or Mizora.
PAD.how_to_trigger: - Load SCL_Main_A- Go to the Colony using the debugbook:- If you come through the main entrance, walk into the main corridor- If you come through the Necromancer's Room, walk to the main entrance- To trigger Wyll's nodes:Set HAV_Florrick_Event_WyllPresent_5763b529-e86f-7674-c385-5cfedf4ce556 or TWN_Wyll_State_MizorasCaptureWyllPresent_95c16d66-905f-ca29-f4ec-634a363d0e80and enter the triggers as Wyll

AudienceTentacle.synopsis: An interaction with a huge tentacle that is psychically connected to the Elder Brain. Will only appear at the Colony's Moonrise Assault entrance if we came from the Necro-Lab - the tentacle won't have broken through Moonrise Tower. The tentacle will disappear again once the Elder Brain departs.A psionic pulse will emanate from the tentacle when we approach it, and we will get psychically told some personal history from the Elder Brain.
AudienceTentacle.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/SCL_Main_A- Either use "oe Necromancer_Audience" in ReCon or go to the Audience route through the debugbook.- Escape or kill the cage you get teleported into.- Kill combat.- Go into the central corridor and to the Assault entrance of the Colony- Interact with S_COL_Entrance_Audience_Tentacle_c7291e48-45e1-43c5-b243-8b4716e1344e

PAD_NeverThoughtWouldReturn_1.speaker: Jaheira
PAD_NeverThoughtWouldReturn_1.text: Of all the beastly lairs I've had to poke my nose into - an illithid colony is still by far the worst.
PAD_NeverThoughtWouldReturn_1.context: InternalNodeContext:  Referencing Bhaalspawn/Abdel (Unsure if it's a canon adventure? Might be)

PAD_NeverThoughtWouldReturn_0.speaker: Player
PAD_NeverThoughtWouldReturn_0.text: I think we have more pressing concerns than a trip down memory lane.

PAD_0.speaker: Player
PAD_0.text: I wager that devil I'm meant to rescue's somewhere near.

PAD_2.speaker: Player
PAD_2.text: I'll spot my father too, with any luck.

PAD_1.speaker: Player
PAD_1.text: All of this, sitting beneath Moonrise. For how long? And how deep does it go?
PAD_1.context: NodeContext: Lae'zel line: teh-LA TAHV-key (spirits guide me)

PAD_4.speaker: Player
PAD_4.text: Your father too, if our fortunes are so kind.

AudienceTentacle_0.speaker: Narrator
AudienceTentacle_0.text: *A giant stalk of flesh rests before you, fibrous tendrils snaking up and away into darkness. It pulses like a living, breathing thing.*

AudienceTentacle_3.speaker: Narrator
AudienceTentacle_3.text: *It is alive. Your tadpole echoes awareness - and the deep, savage fury of a wild thing caged.*

AudienceTentacle_2.speaker: Narrator
AudienceTentacle_2.text: *This being - the colony itself - burns to rage, to tear these impostors from its core. And instead it rests, like a docile pet.*
